name: Hyperactive (Mrowmis)
description:
Hyperactive

PC Game

Physics Puzzle Game

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 8+, or any casual puzzle gamers

Game Overview: Use bizarre physics to crash your way through six puzzle rooms.

Instructions: Use WASD to move, and mouse to point. Ricochet the ball to the exits, and follow suit until you reach the end.

Game Design Team: Just me, Jeremiah Underwood.
